name: envShader
vs: precision highp float; attribute vec3 position; attribute vec2 uv; varying vec2 vUv; void main() { vUv = uv; gl_Position = vec4(position, 1.0); }
fs: precision highp float; uniform sampler2D tex; varying vec2 vUv; void main() { vec3 color = texture2D(tex, vUv).rgb; gl_FragColor = vec4(color, 1.0); }
